entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Markham
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:48 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Buttonville Municipal Airport 4:00 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023
Temperature: -2.3°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -3.9°C
Wind: N 17 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of light snow this evening and ending after midnight then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming north 20 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Cloudy. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023
